title: 5 Takeaways From the Hochul-Zeldin Debate
description: Representative Lee Zeldin conveyed a sense of outrage over crime and the economy, as Gov. Kathy Hochul emphasized his views on abortion and his ties to Donald Trump.
dc:creator: Luis Ferré-Sadurní and Michael Gold
media:credit: Mary Altaffer/Pool, Associated Press, via Associated Press
media:description: Representative Lee Zeldin, left, and Gov. Kathy Hochul, right, faced off on Tuesday in the first and only debate in the race for governor of New York.
